title: OSCE Election Observers Warn of Republican Election Deniers
description: Attempts by candidates to discredit the integrity of the vote have “snowballed enormously” since the 2020 election, the head of the observation mission said.
dc:creator: Chris Cameron
category: Organization for Security and Cooperation in Europe
media:credit: Jodi Hilton for The New York Times
media:description: Voting in the Massachusetts primary last month. A report by the Organization for Security and Cooperation in Europe highlighted a number of concerns for the U.S. midterm elections.
